Frequently Asked Questions

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be prorated and reflected in your next billing cycle.

Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial on all plans. No credit card required to start your trial.

We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans. Enterprise customers can also pay via invoice.

Yes, we offer a 20% discount when you choose annual billing instead of monthly billing.

We'll notify you when you're approaching your limits. You can upgrade your plan at any time to continue without interruption.

No setup fees for any of our plans. You only pay the advertised monthly or annual price.
